channel.title: TvOS 26 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TvOS 26 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: iOS 26, iPadOS 26, macOS 26 Tahoe, and Apple’s other OS updates launch September 15
item.description: If your device is supported, it’s getting Liquid Glass-ier later this month.

item.title: tvOS 26 Brings New Aerial Screen Saver Controls, India Footage
item.description: Apple’s upcoming tvOS 26 update brings some neat new features to Apple TV, including a redesigned TV app, a new profile selector on wake, and a design overhaul matching Apple’s new multi-platform span
